videoEdit.title: Edit Video
videoEdit.thumbnailTooltip: The preview image is shown in the video overview and when sharing. Recommended: 1280x720px in 16:9 format.
videoEdit.guestsTooltip: Add guests who appear in the video. Their social media links will be displayed below the video.
videoEdit.exclusiveTooltip: Exclusive content is only visible to paying members. Non-members will see a membership prompt.
videoEdit.statusTooltip: Drafts are only visible to admins. Published videos are accessible to all visitors.
videoEdit.errorDurationFailed: Video duration could not be determined

videoUpload.title: Upload Video
videoUpload.thumbnailTooltip: Automatically generated from a video frame if you don't upload one. Recommended: 16:9 format, min. 1280x720px.
videoUpload.extractingFramesDetail: Frames are extracted at 20%, 40%, 60%, 80% and 100% of the video length
videoUpload.frameHint: This frame will be used as thumbnail if you don't upload your own or generate with AI.
videoUpload.guestsTooltip: Add guests who appear in the video. Their social media links will be displayed below the video.
videoUpload.publishToNewsfeedTooltip: Automatically creates a post in the newsfeed with thumbnail and link to the video.
videoUpload.exclusiveTooltip: Only paying members can see this video. Non-members will see a paywall.
videoUpload.errorFrameExtractionFailed: Frame extraction failed: {{message}}. You can still upload a manual thumbnail.
videoUpload.errorSelectVideoWait: Please select a video and wait until it is uploaded
videoUpload.errorInvalidVideoKey: Video upload failed. Please upload the video again.
videoUpload.errorNoAdminPermission: No admin permission. Please log in as admin.
videoUpload.errorNotAuthenticated: Not authenticated. Please log in again.

videoPlayer.premiumOnlyMessage: This video is only available for premium members. Become a member now to access all exclusive content.
videoPlayer.membersOnlyMessage: This video is only available for members. Please sign in to watch this exclusive content.
videoPlayer.videoError: Video could not be loaded. Please try again later or clear your browser cache.
videoPlayer.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

videoCategory.title: Manage Categories
videoCategory.tooltip: Categories help visitors filter videos by topic. The order determines the display in the filter dropdown.
videoCategory.allAutoAdded: "All" is automatically added as a filter

podcastEdit.title: Edit Podcast
podcastEdit.thumbnailTooltip: The preview image is shown in the podcast overview and when sharing. Recommended: Square format (1:1).
podcastEdit.guestsTooltip: Add guests who are heard in the podcast. Their social media links will be displayed below the podcast.

podcastUpload.title: Upload Podcast
podcastUpload.thumbnailTooltip: Displayed as cover image for the podcast. Recommended: Square format (1:1) or 16:9.
podcastUpload.aiDescriptionTooltip: AI transcribes the audio content and automatically creates a description. This may take a few minutes.
podcastUpload.aiDescriptionInfo: The description will be automatically generated from the audio content.
podcastUpload.aiDescriptionWait: This may take a few minutes.
podcastUpload.guestsTooltip: Add guests who are heard in the podcast. Their social media links will be displayed below the podcast.
podcastUpload.publishToNewsfeedTooltip: Automatically creates a post in the newsfeed with thumbnail and link to the podcast.
podcastUpload.exclusiveTooltip: Only paying members can listen to this podcast. Non-members will see a paywall.

podcastCategory.title: Manage Categories
podcastCategory.tooltip: Categories help visitors filter podcasts by topic. The order determines the display in the filter dropdown.

eventModal.eventImageTooltip: The event image is shown in the event overview and when sharing. Recommended: 16:9 format.
eventModal.title: Title
eventModal.locationTooltip: The venue will be displayed on the event page.
eventModal.googleMapsTooltip: Add a Google Maps link so visitors can find their way.
eventModal.ticketLinkTooltip: Link to an external ticket shop, e.g. Eventbrite or Ticketmaster.
eventModal.guestsTooltip: Add guests or artists performing at the event. Their social media links will be displayed on the event page.
eventModal.errorRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields (title, description, date)

eventDetail.eventPassed: This event has already taken place

productModal.productPhotoTooltip: The product image is shown in the shop and on the product page. Recommended: Square format.
productModal.externalShopLinkTooltip: Link to an external shop if the product is sold there.
productModal.externalShopLinkHint: Redirects buyers to an external shop
productModal.stockTooltip: Number of available units. At 0, the product will be shown as sold out.
productModal.newProductDescription: Discover our new product "{{name}}" for only {{price}}!

productDetail.soldOut: This product is unfortunately sold out.
productDetail.addedToCart: {{name}} has been added to your cart!
productDetail.productSoldOut: This product is unfortunately sold out

shopSettings.title: Shop Settings
shopSettings.taxRateTooltip: The tax rate is applied to all products and shown on the invoice.
shopSettings.notificationEmailTooltip: Notifications about new orders will be sent to this email address.
shopSettings.notificationEmailHint: Order confirmations will be sent to this address
shopSettings.securityNoteText: Your API keys are stored encrypted. Always use live keys in production and test with sandbox/test keys first.

newsfeedModal.title: Title
newsfeedModal.postDescPlaceholder: What would you like to share?
newsfeedModal.externalLinkTooltip: Add an external link that will be displayed below the post.
newsfeedModal.externalLinkHint: https:// is automatically added if no protocol is specified
newsfeedModal.locationTooltip: The location will be displayed below the post.
newsfeedModal.googleMapsTooltip: Add a Google Maps link so visitors can find their way.
newsfeedModal.mediaTooltip: Add images or a video. Images are automatically cropped.
newsfeedModal.tiktokMinImages: TikTok requires at least 2 images for carousel posts. Add another image or remove this one so the post is published as text only.
newsfeedModal.mediaHint: Images: max. 35 (TikTok), 20MB per image ‚Ä¢ Video: max. 1, 100MB
newsfeedModal.shortVideoCannotChange: The video of a Short cannot be changed afterwards.
newsfeedModal.errorTitleDescRequired: Please enter a title and description

shortModal.title: Create Short
shortModal.subtitle: Vertical video (9:16) ‚Ä¢ Max. {{maxDuration}}s
shortModal.tiktokBlockedHint: You can still publish the short on other platforms.
shortModal.tiktokDailyLimitReached: You have reached the daily posting limit for TikTok. Please try again later.
shortModal.tiktokProcessingNotice: After publishing, it may take a few minutes for your video to be processed and visible on your TikTok profile.
shortModal.videoTooLongTooltip: Video is too long for TikTok (max. {{max}}s)
shortModal.videoTooLongHint: Video is too long for TikTok (max. {{max}}s, currently {{duration}}s)
shortModal.errorShouldBeVertical: ‚ö†Ô∏è Horizontal videos will be posted on TikTok with letterboxing. Vertical format (9:16) is recommended.
shortModal.errorVideoTooLongTikTok: Video is too long for TikTok (max. {{max}}s, currently {{duration}}s)
shortModal.successUploadedTikTok: Short uploaded successfully! TikTok processing may take a few minutes.

teamMemberModal.profileImageTooltip: The profile picture is displayed on the team page. Recommended: Square format, will be cropped to a circle.
teamMemberModal.socialLinksTooltip: Add social media links. The platform is automatically detected and the matching icon is displayed.
teamMemberModal.platformAutoDetect: Platform is automatically detected (Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Twitch, TikTok, LinkedIn, Facebook, Discord, Spotify)

channelManagementModal.title: Channel Management
channelManagementModal.addDescription: Add your social media channels. The platform is automatically detected.
channelManagementModal.addTooltip: Simply paste the URL of your social media profile. The matching icon and color are automatically detected.
channelManagementModal.errorFillUrls: Please fill in the URL for all channels

liveChat.loginToChat: Sign in to participate in the live chat

liveChat.beFirst: Be the first to write something!

slotManager.title: Manage Posting Slots
slotManager.subtitle: Schedule when your content is automatically published
slotManager.howItWorks1: Define time slots for each day of the week

slotManager.howItWorks3: Content will be automatically published at the next available slot

slotManager.example3xDesc: Mon, Wed, Fri at 12:00 PM and 6:00 PM
slotManager.exampleMultipleDesc: Every day at 9:00 AM, 1:00 PM and 7:00 PM

molliePaymentSetup.checkoutOpened: Mollie checkout opened in a new tab
molliePaymentSetup.confirmRevoke: Do you really want to revoke the payment method? Your subscription will also be cancelled.
molliePaymentSetup.autoDebitDescription: Your monthly costs will be automatically debited.
molliePaymentSetup.name: Name
molliePaymentSetup.setupDescription: Set up a payment method (SEPA, credit card, PayPal, etc.) so we can automatically debit your monthly costs (‚Ç¨30 base fee + usage costs).
molliePaymentSetup.step1: You will be redirected to Mollie
molliePaymentSetup.step2: Choose your bank and authorize the mandate
molliePaymentSetup.step3: A small amount (‚Ç¨0.01) will be debited for verification
molliePaymentSetup.step4: From now on, your costs will be automatically collected
molliePaymentSetup.poweredBy: Powered by Mollie. Your bank details are securely stored at Mollie and not on our servers.

mollieConnectSetup.confirmDisconnect: Do you really want to disconnect Mollie? Existing member subscriptions will remain active at Mollie.
mollieConnectSetup.connectActiveDescription: Your Mollie account is connected. You can now bill member subscriptions.
mollieConnectSetup.memberBillingDescription: Payments from your members go directly to your Mollie account. You keep full control over your revenue.
mollieConnectSetup.reconnectDescription: The Mollie connection has expired. Please reconnect your account.
mollieConnectSetup.setupDescription: Connect your Mollie account to bill memberships directly. Payments go directly to your account.
mollieConnectSetup.noteDescription: You need a verified Mollie account. If you don't have one yet, you can create it during the connection process.
mollieConnectSetup.guideStep2Desc: Mollie requires: name, address, bank details (IBAN) and your Viral Tenant URL. Takes about 1-2 business days.
mollieConnectSetup.guideStep3Desc: After verification, click "Connect with Mollie" above and authorize the connection.
mollieConnectSetup.guideStep4Desc: Afterwards, earnings from your memberships will be billed via Mollie and paid out to your bank account.
mollieConnectSetup.poweredBy: Powered by Mollie Connect. Secure OAuth connection.

pageSettings.title: Manage Pages
pageSettings.tooltip: Enable/disable pages in the navigation, customize titles and subtitles, and change the order via drag & drop.
pageSettings.confirmReset: Reset all titles, subtitles and order to default?
pageSettings.confirmDeletePage: Really delete this page? All content will be lost.

membershipSettingsModal.monthlyPriceTooltip: The monthly amount members pay. Mollie transaction fees are deducted additionally.
membershipSettingsModal.benefitsTooltip: List the benefits members receive. These will be displayed on the membership page.

newsfeedSettings.xTwitterDescription: Automatically post on X (Twitter) when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.xOneClick: One click ‚Äî post text, images & videos
newsfeedSettings.xInfo2: Sign in to X and allow access
newsfeedSettings.xInfo3: Your account will be linked automatically
newsfeedSettings.xInfo4: You can disconnect at any time
newsfeedSettings.xInfo5: Posts will be published as tweets with a link
newsfeedSettings.linkedInInfo2: Sign in to LinkedIn and allow access
newsfeedSettings.linkedInInfo3: Choose whether to post to page or profile
newsfeedSettings.threadsInfo2: Sign in to Threads and allow access
newsfeedSettings.threadsInfo3: Posts will be published as Threads posts
newsfeedSettings.youtubePublishShorts: Shorts (9:16 videos) ‚Üí uploaded as YouTube Shorts
newsfeedSettings.youtubePublishVideos: Regular videos (16:9) ‚Üí uploaded as YouTube Videos
newsfeedSettings.youtubePublishText: Text only ‚Üí published as Community Post
newsfeedSettings.youtubeInfo2: Sign in to Google and allow access
newsfeedSettings.youtubeInfo3: Videos will be published on your YouTube channel
newsfeedSettings.businessAccountHint: Only Business Accounts can post via the API. Switch to a Business Account in your TikTok settings.
newsfeedSettings.draftDescription: Posts will be saved as drafts and must be published manually in TikTok
newsfeedSettings.tiktokTermsAccept: I accept the TikTok Terms of Use
newsfeedSettings.tiktokSingleImages: Single images ‚Üí will NOT be posted (min. 2 required)
newsfeedSettings.tiktokTextOnly: Text only ‚Üí will NOT be posted
newsfeedSettings.tiktokPhotoRequirements: Photo post requirements: Min. 2 images, max. 35 images. Format: JPEG/WebP. Recommended resolution: 1080√ó1920px (9:16 vertical). Max. 20MB per image.
newsfeedSettings.tiktokProcessingTime: Processing may take a few minutes
newsfeedSettings.tiktokTermsAccepted: You accepted the TikTok terms on {{date}}
newsfeedSettings.snapchatDescription: Automatically post on Snapchat when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.publishAsStoryDesc: Posts will be published as Snapchat Stories
newsfeedSettings.snapchatInfo2: Sign in to Snapchat and allow access
newsfeedSettings.snapchatInfo4: Videos should be in portrait format (9:16)
newsfeedSettings.snapchatShorts: Shorts (9:16 videos) ‚Üí uploaded as Snapchat Stories
newsfeedSettings.snapchatTextOnly: Text only ‚Üí will NOT be posted
newsfeedSettings.emailDescription: Automatically send emails to your registered users when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.emailSubjectHint: Used as the email subject line
newsfeedSettings.emailInfo3: Recipients: All registered users of your tenant
newsfeedSettings.emailInfo4: Users can unsubscribe via link in the email
newsfeedSettings.facebookDescription: Automatically post on your Facebook page when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.facebookInfo1: You must be admin of a Facebook page
newsfeedSettings.facebookInfo2: Token is valid for 60 days, then reconnect
newsfeedSettings.facebookInfo3: Posts appear on your Facebook page
newsfeedSettings.instagramDescription: Automatically post on Instagram when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.instagramDirectLogin: Log in directly with Instagram - no Facebook page needed!
newsfeedSettings.instagramInfo1: Instagram Business or Creator Account required
newsfeedSettings.instagramInfo2: No Facebook page needed - log in directly with Instagram!
newsfeedSettings.instagramInfo3: Only images/videos possible, no text-only posts
newsfeedSettings.instagramInfo4: Token is valid for 60 days, then reconnect
newsfeedSettings.instagramShorts: Shorts (9:16 videos) ‚Üí uploaded as Instagram Reels
newsfeedSettings.instagramLandscapeVideos: 16:9 videos ‚Üí posted as Reels with letterboxing
newsfeedSettings.instagramTextOnly: Text-only posts ‚Üí will NOT be posted (Instagram requires media)
newsfeedSettings.instagramOptimization: Instagram optimizes all videos for mobile. 9:16 (vertical) is recommended for best display.
newsfeedSettings.whatsappDescription: Automatically send WhatsApp messages to your subscribers when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.subscriberHint: Users who receive your updates via WhatsApp
newsfeedSettings.shareQrCode: Share this QR code with your fans! Scanning it opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message.
newsfeedSettings.whatsappInfo1: Users subscribe via WhatsApp message to the central number
newsfeedSettings.whatsappInfo3: All subscribers are notified with each new post
newsfeedSettings.whatsappInfo4: Images and videos are sent automatically
newsfeedSettings.signalDescription: Automatically post to a Signal group when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.signalInfo1: Signal has no official Bot API
newsfeedSettings.signalInfo4: Separate phone number needed for the bot
newsfeedSettings.signalInfo5: Group ID: Retrieve via signal-cli listGroups
newsfeedSettings.blueskyDescription: Automatically post on Bluesky when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.blueskyInfo1: Go to bsky.app ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí App Passwords
newsfeedSettings.blueskyInfo4: App Password is NOT your login password
newsfeedSettings.blueskyInfo5: Bluesky posts are limited to 300 characters
newsfeedSettings.mastodonDescription: Automatically post on Mastodon when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.mastodonInfo1: Go to your Mastodon instance ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Development
newsfeedSettings.mastodonInfo5: Instance URL is the address of your Mastodon instance
newsfeedSettings.telegramDescription: Automatically post to a Telegram channel when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.telegramInfo3: Bot Token will be shown after creation
newsfeedSettings.telegramInfo4: Add the bot to your channel/group (as admin)
newsfeedSettings.telegramInfo5: Chat ID: Send a message to @userinfobot or @getidsbot
newsfeedSettings.discordDescription: Automatically post to a Discord channel when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.discordInfo1: Right-click on the Discord channel ‚Üí Edit Channel
newsfeedSettings.discordInfo4: Copy the webhook URL and paste it here
newsfeedSettings.slackDescription: Automatically post to a Slack channel when you create a new post.
newsfeedSettings.slackInfo1: Go to api.slack.com/apps ‚Üí Create New App
newsfeedSettings.slackInfo4: Add New Webhook to Workspace ‚Üí Choose channel
newsfeedSettings.slackInfo5: Copy the webhook URL and paste it here
